vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to make hard, treat hardly, treat severely
1a) (Hiphil)
1a1) to make hard, make stubborn
1a2) to treat hardly, treat roughly
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 使堅硬, 嚴厲對待
1a) (Hiphil)
1a1) 使堅硬, 使頑固 #賽 63:17|
1a2) 嚴厲對待, 粗暴對待 #伯 39:16|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 使坚硬, 严厉对待
1a) (Hiphil)
1a1) 使坚硬, 使顽固 #赛 63:17|
1a2) 严厉对待, 粗暴对待 #伯 39:16|
